t: What is brand loyalty and why is it important? | Amazon Ads
s: 2 days ago - Brand loyalty is when customers continue to purchase from the same brand over and over again, despite competitors offering similar products or services. Not only do customers continue engaging and purchasing from the same brand, but they also associate positive feelings toward that brand.

t: Amazon's Customer Loyalty Is Astounding
s: January 10, 2018 - A new study of Amazon customers from Feedvisor reveals that Amazon is their one-stop shop for online shopping. 85% of Prime members, and 56% of non-members, visit Amazon at least once a week and one-third come ready to buy. Time for small businesses to consider Amazon's third-party seller platform.
